title: Personalized Event Suggestions for Connection
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to recommend local social events based on my interests so that I can stay connected with family and friends while combating feelings of isolation.

title: Scheduled Video Calls with Family
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to schedule video calls with my family members so that I can maintain social connections and feel less isolated.

title: Interest-Based Community Interaction - Facilitating Local Meetups for Social Inclusion
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want ALFRED to suggest local community events based on my interests so that I can stay socially connected and feel less isolated.

title: Memory Lane – Voice Playback of Memorable Messages from Family
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want to listen to voice messages from my family so that I can feel more connected and less isolated, especially when I cannot travel to see them.

title: Flexible Communication Modes – Voice-to-Text Messaging for Easy Connectivity
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want to send and receive messages using voice-to-text functionality so that I can easily communicate with my family and friends without feeling overwhelmed by complex technology.

title: Social Skill Building Activities – Conversation Starters for Enhanced Engagement
summary: As a tech-curious older adult, I want conversation starters to be suggested by ALFRED so that I can engage more easily with my family and friends during video calls and feel less isolated.

title: Proactive Check-Ins for Emotional Support
summary: As a tech-curious older adult with mild mobility issues, I want ALFRED to proactively check in on me during high-risk times so that I can feel more connected and less isolated, especially when my children are not around.
